div.head: 金瘡中風
div.div: wind stroke via wounds inflicted by metal objects

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: wind stroke via wounds inflicted by metal objects

sense.def: Alternative Names jin chuang de feng 金瘡得風 , wind obtained through wounds inflicted by metal objects. Pathological Condition identical with po shang feng 破傷風 , wound wind. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 29: 必效療金 瘡中風，角弓反張者方 , “It will certainly cure wind stroke via wounds inflicted by metal objects and also arched reverse strain”.
